name: Goblin Crown
description:
## Goblin Crown

Summon the Goblin leader and reveal who the mastermind is behind the Goblin resistance.

~~You can craft this item at the Goblin Blacksmith in the game.~~ **Sold out!**

## Supply

5000

### Crafting Costs

---

- 5 SFL
